    		About Advancement Services
    	Ensuring Donor Confidentiality and ReportingAdvancement Services is instrumental to Chico State's success in creating and strengthening relationships through outreach, fundraising, events and stewardship. Our purpose is to provide data management and reporting for all Advancement related activities that complies with University polices and federal regulations, and in accordance with the donor's intent.We also manage and enhance Chico State's constituents' data. Requests for donor and alumni data for mailings, solicitations, invitations, email correspondences, etc. should be submitted to Advancement Services using the Advancement Portal.For more information about Advancement Services, please call Dwight Seuser at 530-898-4405.Learn MoreGift Processing & ManagementGift Processing FAQMatching GiftsDocumentsCommunications and Form SupportAdvancement Staff PortalWhen using wireless connection, log in with VPN.Advancement Services DocumentsUniversity AdvancementVice President Ahmad BouraKendall Hall, Room 114530-898-3590www.csuchico.edu/advancementSupport Chico StateDepartmentsAdvancement ServicesAlumni & Parent EngagementUniversity CommunicationsUniversity DevelopmentUniversity Public EngagementChico Performances(opens in new window)
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
